name: team-jameslee
description: Curated Claude Code plugins for productivity and code quality

plugins.name: react-best-practices-review
plugins.description: React/Next.js performance review with confidence-based filtering. Detects async waterfalls, rerenders, bundle issues.

plugins.name: session-recap
plugins.description: Track work sessions with structured logs (/log) and get quick recaps (/recap). Supports Korean & English.

plugins.name: prompt-template-analyzer
plugins.description: Analyze past prompts to discover patterns and create reusable AskUserQuestion-based interactive templates.

plugins.name: ui-cloner
plugins.description: Clone UI components from reference websites with CSS extraction, multi-framework support (React, Vue, Next.js), and interaction capture.

plugins.name: site-mirror
plugins.description: Mirror websites by downloading original resources and converting CDN URLs to local paths. Achieves ~95% fidelity for offline viewing.

plugins.name: ui-cloner-v2
plugins.description: Clone UI with Chrome DevTools Protocol. Extracts 40+ CSS properties, authored CSS, structural patterns, and performs dual-page pixel-perfect verification.

plugins.name: ui-cloner-v3
plugins.description: 100% Perfect UI Clone with generalization-validated Tier system. Achieves 95%+ similarity on 80%+ of sites. CSS variables, z-index layers, Tailwind CSS auto-detection.

plugins.name: project-deep-review
plugins.description: Deep research-based holistic project analysis. 5 specialized agents evaluate tech stack, UX/UI, performance, domain moat, and code quality against latest best practices with anti-bias impact scoring.
